title: The Raven's Call
description: Authors Note: January 2020: The Raven's Call has been reissued under the same ISBN with a brand new cover! Access the newest version here: https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/5...Victoria McKinley is determined to remain single while mending a heart that careless lovers have left in tatters. She's doing an excellent job, too, until . . .CIA officer, Raven, on current assignment as Professor Mitch Logan, is used to getting what he wants by any means necessary. It isn't long before he realizes what he wants is Tori. For the mission. For his bed.Even he knows the attraction blazing between them may vanish as soon as his identity is revealed; especially when his past throws them all in danger.Good thing he specializes in the impossible . . .
author: Rose Walken
